verses.text: \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w will|strong="H4100"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w watch|strong="H6822"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* fix \w my|strong="H5921"\w* foot \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* tower: \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w will|strong="H4100"\w* \w watch|strong="H6822"\w*, \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w will|strong="H4100"\w* \w be|strong="H7725"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w may|strong="H7725"\w* \w answer|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* reproveth \w me|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Write|strong="H3789"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w vision|strong="H2377"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H7121"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* plain \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* tables: \w that|strong="H4616"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H4616"\w* readeth \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w run|strong="H7323"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w vision|strong="H2377"\w* \w is|strong="H7093"\w* far off, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* appear \w at|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w end|strong="H7093"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w lie|strong="H3576"\w*: \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* \w any|strong="H5750"\w* \w delay|strong="H0309"\w*, \w wait|strong="H2442"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* slack.

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* unbelieving, \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w right|strong="H3474"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w himself|strong="H5315"\w*: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H2009"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w faith|strong="H0530"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1471"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* deceiveth \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* drinketh \w it|strong="H1931"\w*: \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* proud \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* honoured: \w who|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w enlarged|strong="H7337"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w desire|strong="H5315"\w* \w like|strong="H0834"\w* hell: \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w himself|strong="H1931"\w* \w like|strong="H0834"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*, \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* \w together|strong="H0622"\w* unto \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w and|strong="H1471"\w* heap \w together|strong="H0622"\w* unto \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w Shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w take|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w a|strong="H5375"\w* \w parable|strong="H4912"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H4912"\w* \w a|strong="H5375"\w* \w dark|strong="H2420"\w* speech \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*: \w and|strong="H4912"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* heapeth \w together|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w which|strong="H0428"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* own? \w how|strong="H4970"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* also doth \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w load|strong="H5375"\w* \w himself|strong="H3513"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* thick clay?

\w Shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w suddenly|strong="H6621"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* bite thee: \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w stirred|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* tear thee, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* thou shalt \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w spoil|strong="H4933"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w*?

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast spoiled \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* \w left|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* spoil thee: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w menâ€™s|strong="H0120"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* iniquity \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H7151"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein.

\w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w him|strong="H7760"\w* \w that|strong="H1004"\w* gathereth \w together|strong="H1215"\w* \w an|strong="H7760"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* covetousness \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w that|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w nest|strong="H7064"\w* \w may|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H1004"\w* \w on|strong="H1004"\w* \w high|strong="H4791"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* thinketh \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w may|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H1004"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* \w out|strong="H7451"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.

Thou hast \w devised|strong="H3289"\w* confusion \w to|strong="H1004"\w* thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, thou hast \w cut|strong="H7096"\w* \w off|strong="H7096"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* hath \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* \w shall|strong="H0068"\w* \w cry|strong="H2199"\w* \w out|strong="H2199"\w* \w of|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*: \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w timber|strong="H6086"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3588"\w* between \w the|strong="H3588"\w* joints \w of|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* building, \w shall|strong="H0068"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w*.

\w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* \w to|strong="H3559"\w* him \w that|strong="H3559"\w* buildeth \w a|strong="H1129"\w* \w town|strong="H7151"\w* \w with|strong="H1129"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* prepareth \w a|strong="H1129"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w by|strong="H3559"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w*.

\w Are|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w these|strong="H5971"\w* \w things|strong="H3808"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*? \w for|strong="H6635"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* labour \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* great \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w nations|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* vain, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* faint.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* men \w may|strong="H0776"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w covering|strong="H3680"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

\w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H4616"\w* giveth \w drink|strong="H8248"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*, \w and|strong="H7453"\w* presenteth \w his|strong="H5921"\w* gall, \w and|strong="H7453"\w* maketh \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w drunk|strong="H7937"\w*, \w that|strong="H4616"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H4616"\w* \w behold|strong="H5027"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H4589"\w*.

Thou art \w filled|strong="H7646"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w shame|strong="H7036"\w* instead \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*: \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* thou \w also|strong="H1571"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* fall fast asleep: \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* compass thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* shameful vomiting \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* iniquity \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Libanus \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ravaging \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* terrify \w them|strong="H3427"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* iniquity \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H7151"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein.

\w What|strong="H4100"\w* doth \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w graven|strong="H6459"\w* \w thing|strong="H3588"\w* \w avail|strong="H3276"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w maker|strong="H3335"\w* thereof hath \w graven|strong="H6459"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w a|strong="H3588"\w* molten, \w and|strong="H6459"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w false|strong="H8267"\w* \w image|strong="H6459"\w*? \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* forger thereof hath \w trusted|strong="H0982"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w thing|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* own forging, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* dumb \w idols|strong="H0457"\w*.

\w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* saith \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*: \w Awake|strong="H5782"\w*: \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* dumb \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*: \w Arise|strong="H5782"\w*: \w can|strong="H0369"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w teach|strong="H3384"\w*? \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w laid|strong="H3384"\w* \w over|strong="H8610"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w in|strong="H7130"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* bowels thereof.

\w But|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*: let \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w keep|strong="H2013"\w* \w silence|strong="H2013"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.
